name: UMA (KyraEgon)
description:
UMA - is a short horror game in which you are a worker in a place far from the city, where something that is supposed to be just "a Peruvian myth" will start to harass you. CONTROLS:
  • WASD - MOVE
  • SHIFT -RUN
  • E - INTERACT
  • Esc - Exit

FEATURE: Game translated into Spanish, English and German CREDITS: -MOST PROPS BY : Elbolilloduro -FORKLIFY BY : LucasCoppio -RAT MODEL BY: rhcreations -INSPIRATION: KenForest -SOUNDS FROM: freesound.org
